name: BirdyGoUp
description:
Help Birdy get back to its nest at the very top!

  • Click & Drag Left Mouse Button to aim & shoot.
  • Click & Drag Right Mouse Button to move the camera and plan your next shot.

This game is in development and the map is just rudimentary. It's more or less a prototype at this stage.
If you managed to reach the top please let me know :)

Assets and programming by me.

Except for the Font, that's from https://justkato.itch.io/pixelatedlove!

Game made with Godot Engine!
